Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.adapters

Class EnumAdapter<E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.adapters.EnumAdapter<E>
Type Parameters:
E - enum type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigValueAdapter<E>
public class EnumAdapter<E extends Enum<E>> extends Object implements ConfigValueAdapter<E>
Generic adapter for enums using their name() for serialization.
